channel.title: Projects on Robotics Club
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Robotics Club

item.title: Analytical and Experimental Approach for Modeling, Simulation and Validation of Two-Wheeled Self-Balancing Robot
item.description: Two-Wheeled Self-Balancing Robot (TWSBR) has many applications and is an important research topic in robotics and control engineering.

item.title: Robotic Arm
item.description: A robotic arm is a mechanical arm that functions similarly to a human hand and is used in agriculture to pluck ready-to-eat fruits off trees using artificial intelligence.
